context:

이후 체력을 현재 최대 체력의 15%만큼 회복. 현재 체력이 현재 최대 체력의 30% 미만인 경우, 대신 25%만큼 회복.
(스테이지당 최대 3회 발동. 스테이지 종료 시 최대 체력 증가가 해제되며, 해제 시점의 체력 비율에 맞게 현재 체력이 조정됨.)
EN:

Then, heal by 15% of current Max HP. If at less than 30% of current Max HP, heal by 25% instead.
(3 times per encounter. At Encounter End, revert to base Max HP. Current HP value will be adjusted to reflect the HP percentage at the time of Encounter End.)

対象の([Sinking]威力 + 回数)5につき、追加で1獲得(最大3)
(最も少ないE.G.O資源が2つ以上ならランダムに獲得)
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
自分の攻撃終了時に対象が死亡した場合、最も少ないE.G.O資源を1つ獲得。
対象の([Sinking]威力 + 回数)5につき、追加で1獲得(最大3)
(最も少ないE.G.O資源が2つ以上ならランダムに獲得)
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:
자신의 공격 종료 시 대상이 사망한 경우, 가장 수량이 적은 E.G.O. 자원 1개 획득.
대상의 ([Sinking] 위력 + 횟수) 5 당 추가로 1개 획득 (최대 3)
(가장 수량이 적은 E.G.O 자원이 2개 이상이면, 부족한 자원 중 무작위로 획득)
EN:
After Attack: If the target is defeated after this unit's attack, gain 1 E.G.O resource for the least-owned E.G.O resource.
Gain 1 additional E.G.O resource for every 5 ([Sinking] Potency + Count) (max 3)
(If there are 2 or more "least-owned E.G.O resource", select 1 of those Affinities at random to gain an E.G.O resource)

<CMT_KR>

translation:

context:

EN:
If the main target took HP damage this turn and isn't at max HP at Skill Use:
On Hit,
- When this unit is at max HP, deal +5~+10% damage.
- When this unit isn't at max HP, heal 2~5 HP. 
(7 times per turn)

EN:
If the target is defeated after this unit's Attack or Counter Skills:
- Gain 2 [Agility] next turn (once per turn)
- To all allies, including this unit: next turn, apply 1 DMG Up to the Damage Type & Affinity of the Skill used to activate this effect (once per turn)
- Inflict 1 [Reduction] to all enemies next turn (once per turn)

When this unit dies:
- Apply 1 [ShamrockDamageUp] and [PenetrateDamageUp] to all allies next turn (once per turn)
- Inflict 1 [Reduction] to all enemies next turn (once per turn)
